## toDot variable

Takes a [DGraph](./dgraph.dgraph.md) and object of visualization &amp; serialization options. Returns Graphviz DOT format serialization of given graph.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toDot: <T>(src: DGraph<T>, opts: DGraphDotOpts<T>) => string
```
